job.name: overtime_mail_sample
job.author: test@test.co
job.description:
Comanyデータ利用
複数のメールアドレスにメール送信

jobParameter.name: ボリューメトリックスの使用 (tFlowMeterCatcher)

component.label: 承認社員のメールを一つにまとめる

条件
column.value: [{FUNCTION=, INPUT_COLUMN=EMAIL, RVALUE=null, OPERATOR=!=}, {FUNCTION=, INPUT_COLUMN=S_EMAIL, RVALUE=null, OPERATOR=!=}, {FUNCTION=, INPUT_COLUMN=SUM_JIKAN, RVALUE=40, OPERATOR=>=}]

column.name: 詳細

column.name: 検索/置換
column.value: [{USE_GLOB=false, CASE_SENSITIVE=true, INPUT_COLUMN=line, REPLACE_STRING=((String)globalMap.get("row8.DATE")), COMMENT=, WHOLE_WORD=false, SEARCH_PATTERN="p_tuki"}, {USE_GLOB=false, CASE_SENSITIVE=true, INPUT_COLUMN=line, REPLACE_STRING=((BigDecimal)globalMap.get("row8.SUM_JIKAN")), COMMENT=, WHOLE_WORD=false, SEARCH_PATTERN="p_time"}, {USE_GLOB=false, CASE_SENSITIVE=true, INPUT_COLUMN=line, REPLACE_STRING=((String)globalMap.get("row8.SYA_NM")), COMMENT=, WHOLE_WORD=false, SEARCH_PATTERN="p_sya_nm"}, {USE_GLOB=false, CASE_SENSITIVE=true, INPUT_COLUMN=line, REPLACE_STRING=((String)globalMap.get("row8.SYA_BG")), COMMENT=, WHOLE_WORD=false, SEARCH_PATTERN="p_sya_bg"}, {USE_GLOB=false, CASE_SENSITIVE=true, INPUT_COLUMN=line, REPLACE_STRING=TalendDate.formatDate("yyyy/MM/dd",TalendDate.getCurrentDate()), COMMENT=, WHOLE_WORD=false, SEARCH_PATTERN="p_date"}]
